TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionMethodItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示与从 派生的类中的方法关联的智能标记面板项。

span.span: Represents a smart tag panel item that is associated with a method in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的各个项。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 此类型的项显示为一个活动的用户界面元素，如调用程序员提供的方法在派生类中的超链接。An item of this type is displayed as an active user interface element, such as a hyperlink, that invokes a programmer-supplied method in a class derived from . 项和方法之间的关联维护的值通过属性。The association between the item and the method is maintained through the value of the property. 此项调用的方法必须不采用参数或返回值。The method that this item invokes must neither take parameters nor return a value. 各个面板项相关联在一起以形成一个面板，通过调用方法的类。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`includeAsDesignerVerb`参数设置为`true`，则此项也被视为; 因此，它将添加到组件的设计时快捷菜单。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 在 Visual Studio 中，命令也将添加到**属性**窗格中的属性窗口。In Visual Studio, a command will also be added to the **Attributes** pane of the Properties window. 可以通过设计器的访问的设计器谓词列表集合属性。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 构造函数设置并属性设置为`null`。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`includeAsDesignerVerb`参数设置为`true`，则此项也被视为; 因此，它将添加到组件的设计时快捷菜单。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 可以通过设计器的访问的设计器谓词列表集合属性。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 详细了解如何`category`参数用于在面板上的项进行分组，请参阅方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 以编程方式执行与 关联的方法。

span.span: Programmatically executes the method associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性初始化为`true`，还可以通过相应的设计器谓词事件调用关联的方法。If the property is initialized to `true`, the associated method can also be invoked through the corresponding designer verb event.

summary.span: 获取与此 关联的方法的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the method that this is associated with.
A that contains the name of the associated method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定派生自的类中的属性，项应绑定到的类。The property specifies which property, in the class derived from the class, that the item should be bound to. 当程序员与通过用户界面 (UI) 的面板项交互时，将设置此关联的属性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 绑定的方法应不能采用参数或返回值。The bound method should neither take parameters nor return a value. 此属性是在构造函数中设置的。This property is set in the constructor. 它是区分大小写。It is case-sensitive.

summary.span: 获取或设置为当前面板提供 对象的组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its objects to the current panel.

value.span: 提供对象的组件，它应有提供项的关联设计器。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许另一个组件来增强其智能标记面板项的当前列表。The property allows another component to lend its smart tag panel items to the current list. 例如，用户控件可能会聚合来自其中一个构成标准控件的项。For example, a user control might aggregate the items from one of its constituent standard controls. 此属性的工作原理与结合属性。This property works in conjunction with the property.
